page.title: 20MY DADS LIFE IN BRANSCOMBE.
page.content: My Dad has lived in Branscombe for 38 years. He used to come to Branscombe school, it took him a quarter of an hour to get to school because he used to fetch his friend who lived down in the square. When he came to school they did not have heaters instead they had a fire. He used to live at Gays Farm which is three quarters of a mile away from the school.When he was young they did not have water at the school instead they used to have milk though they used the pump to wash out the milk bottles, the cloak room used to be in where the sink is.Where he lives now he has not got mains water.
